Tutorial
Swipe right in order to advance forward in the explanation Swipe left in order to go backward in the explanation
Press New - In order to start a new merging of two images
Press Gallery - In order to See old merged photos , Share photos we friends , Add a new merge to an existing picture or Delete
Press Share - In order to share your photos in facebook whatsapp and gmail
Press the red button when you want to take the picture
Press "Save File" if you want to save the first image for later use
Press "Save" to confirm that this is the first image in the merging process and continue on to take the second image
Press "Retake" inorder to take the first image again

When we are going to take the second image we can see an overlay of the first image on top of the current image so we can plan how to take the second image. Press the red button when you want to take the picture
Press "SAVE" to confirm that this is the second image in the merging process and continue to the extraction of the main area from the second image
Press "RETAKE" inorder to take the second image again

In this screen you will choose what area from the second image you want to crop and merge to the first image you took. You will mark the area that you want and don\'t want using strokes on the screen.
Press "KEEP" inorder to choose that the strokes you do on the screen are marking the area you want to keep.
Press "DISCARD" inorder to choose that the strokes you do on the screen are marking the area you want to discard.
Press "UNDO" inorder to undo last stroke.
Press "DONE" when you finished marking the area you want to keep and the area you want to discard.
Inorder to get the best result mark "KEEP" all around the area you want to crop and mark "DISCARD" in closing the area you want to keep.
In this screen you wait until the algorithm crops the area you choose to keep. This can take a minute or two.
When the algorithm gets to 50% it takes the longest until it advanced so be patient.
In this screen you can move the cropped area to the final position. Also you can erase pixels from the croped area the algorithm didn\'t cropped well.
Press "ERASE" inorder to make your strokes on the screen delete the pixels you don\'t want.
Press "UNDO" inorder to undo the last erase.

Press "MOVE" inorder to make the place you press on the screen move the cropped area to there. The red cursor on the cropped area is a reference point.If you press on the screen in a place to the right of it the cropped area will go right If you press on the screen in a place above it the cropped area will go up and so on.
Press "DONE" when you finished editng the croped area and you want to save the final merge picture.
Insert the name of the file and then "Done" in order to save the final image.
